What Is WordPress?

WordPress is an incredibly powerful and reliable open-source content management system that is licensed under the GNU General Public License version 2 (GPLv2). It is an easy-to-use platform for creating and managing websites, blogs, and applications. With WordPress, users can create dynamic websites that are quick to set up and manage.

Anyone can use or modify the WordPress software for free, giving developers the ability to customize their websites without having to pay for expensive services.

With WordPress, you can create:

  • Corporate websites
  • Blogs
  • Ecommerce stores
  • Forums
  • Membership sites

…and more

WordPress is a great solution for any company looking for flexibility, scalability, and minimal cost.

Enjoy our ultimate guide to the WordPress platform!

Reasons For Using WordPress

WordPress is the world’s most popular content management system (CMS). It’s great for web design and development because of its user-friendly interface, incredible versatility, and security features. It can be used for almost any project, from simple blogs to complex websites. Powerful themes and plugins let users design and manage their own content and website. It comes with built-in SEO features that let you improve your website’s online visibility and reach more people.

WordPress sites are great for a wide range of companies, from enterprise organizations to small local businesses.

There are many advantages to using WordPress as a website platform. Here are some of the top reasons why people choose WordPress over other platforms:

  • Free and open source. Anyone can access WordPress, modify it and use it as they wish. There are no upfront fees or restrictions on what you can do with WordPress, making it ideal for website developers and companies that value open-ended possibilities.
  • Extensible. Business owners can modify the platform with themes and plugins. It’s easy to customize your WordPress business website. From creating custom plugins to building your own theme (as we’ve done with our custom WordPress theme for our clients), you can extend the functionality of your website endlessly. You can create your own contact forms, set up an ecommerce store with WooCommerce, and do pretty much whatever you want..
  • Easy to manage. It doesn’t take long to get comfortable with how WordPress works. Even beginners can make their way around the back-end dashboard quickly. Plus, there are lots of tutorials and blogs available to help new users get started with their websites.
  • Flexible. Whether you want a B2B website or an ecommerce store, WordPress can accommodate all different types of sites. It’s highly configurable so you have full control over how your site looks and functions.
  • Mobile responsive. With more people browsing the web on mobile devices these days, having a mobile-friendly website is essential. Fortunately, most WordPress themes come fully responsive so they will look great regardless of what device someone views them on.
  • Built-in blogging platform. A blog is one of the most important tools for any business or organization. Luckily, WordPress has a built-in blogging platform so you don’t need any additional software installed on your server for creating posts or managing comments from readers. This makes running a successful blog much easier than ever before!
  • 24/7 support. WordPress offers live chat customer support for their website subscribers with either a Premium or plugin-enabled plan.

Whether your website requires sophisticated user authentication procedures, regularly updated content libraries, or large databases that need secure access, WordPress provides the power and flexibility needed to make sure everything runs smoothly.

WordPress Project Plan

It is important to have a plan when undertaking a WordPress project. A WordPress project plan makes sure that the goals of WordPress design and development are clear, that tasks are assigned and kept track of, and that everyone involved in the project is kept up to date.

Here are some of the issues that our redesign team focuses on before launching a WordPress website redesign:

  1. Website performance. We will do a comprehensive audit of your current website to identify any potential issues that could impede performance or lead to a drop in conversions. This includes testing page load times, ensuring images are properly optimized, and the site is responsive across all devices.
  2. Website conversions. We will conduct A/B testing to determine which page elements may lead to higher conversion rates; this includes button colors, headlines, copywriting, and imagery.
  3. Site structure. We ensure the site is easily navigable and structured with an intuitive architecture that makes sense to visitors and algorithms alike.
  4. Color palette. Colors will be chosen to complement the brand’s identity while also reflecting customer preferences as determined by A/B testing experiments or surveys.
  5. Bounce rates. Reducing bounce rate is top priority. We optimize page loading speed and make sure the overall user experience is good so that visitors stay on your site and take a desired action.
  6. Authority and credibility. It’s important for websites to display credentials such as awards won or certifications held by the company along with a customer reviews section where past clients can post their experiences. This will help persuade prospective buyers who might still doubt finalizing their order due lack of information.

WordPress Web Design

Our WordPress web design process has been honed over a decade of working with the world’s top brands.

Your custom WordPress website needs to be more than just amazing on the surface. We go above and beyond to make sure that your website speaks to the people you want to reach.

Whether you have an online store or a B2B website, we’ll execute every detail perfectly.

Our design portfolio is a comprehensive showcase of the leading brands that we’ve successfully worked with.

We meet with you to understand your business goals and the performance of your current WordPress website. Together, we’ll come up with a plan for a custom WordPress site that will bring in new customers and leads for your business.

Here are the steps we take with you in order to create a successful WordPress project:

  • Our team will work alongside you to discuss and establish the goals of your project followed by defining what your brand stands for.
  • We work with you to recognize and comprehend who your target audience is and pinpointing their pain points. This helps us gain additional insight while conducting competitor analysis so you stay ahead of the game.
  • We then begin mapping out the architecture of your platform followed by specifying features and functionalities desired.
  • The last step before bringing it all together is coding and debugging, ensuring that everything works as intended prior to launch day.

Web Design Strategy

When approaching WordPress website design, it’s important to consider your target audience. A discovery audit of a company’s wants and needs can help determine the best user experience and interface design.

We make sure to fine-tune your site’s information architecture and write compelling messages that grab users’ attention and show what your brand is all about.

We take into account SEO best practices to raise your company’s profile and visibility in search results.

Design elements are carefully chosen to give the site a unique look and make it easy to find content. Back-end WordPress development and front-end design work together to make sure the whole site works well.

Analytics and Data

By combining raw data analysis with customer feedback, we gain powerful new insights into your business operations.

Analytical data combined with customer input gives us a clear picture of our

customer’s preferences, allowing us to create a more intuitive website experience.

UX, UI Design And Website Structure

When creating a unique look and feel for your site, we’ll refer to your brand guidelines in order to ensure all elements, including colors, logos, graphics, and more, are perfectly cohesive with your company’s messaging, identity, and overall aesthetic.

Interaction Design

Interaction design can be a huge differentiator for your company. This includes looking into the best ways to show content visually, creating navigation options with clear paths, making interactive buttons and forms so that the website flows naturally, and optimizing things like search, multimedia integration, and language localization.

Our team of WordPress experts focuses on micro-interactions throughout your website to create a user interface that is easy to use and intuitive to navigate.

Working with design trends and cutting-edge techniques, our WordPress experts craft experiences that are visually appealing and intuitive.

Transparent Collaboration

Our team of experienced web designers and WordPress developers is dedicated to providing an open and communicative experience, where our clients feel comfortable sharing their ideas and opinions while receiving expert advice from us based on industry trends. Our commitment to openness makes sure that everyone involved in the process feels fully informed and knows how things are going.

You will be able to weigh in on every decision and give feedback along the way, from the first wireframes to the fully customized site. So when your website publishes, it will be perfectly aligned with your brand goals and objectives.

Website Redesign Guide

When we work with you to redesign your WordPress website, our design team develops a complete website design guide that we leave for you. It will cover our custom design, user experience (UX) components, how our design merges with your brand’s image, and more. From your homepage design to your product page design, each design element aligns with your brand and your targeted customers to boost sales.

WordPress Website Development

In addition to being a full-service web design agency, Huemor has full-stack web development capabilities.

Site speed, security, third-party integrations, SEO, and flexibility are paramount for mature businesses. Our developers create custom solutions tailored to address these needs and more. We pair custom web development with a keen eye for branding and design.

Custom WordPress Theme

Our custom WordPress ecommerce theme, “Space Station,” is designed with best practices and SEO optimization in mind. You will be able to easily change and update all parts of your WordPress site.

Space Station gives you infinite flexibility. It’s compatible with all major WordPress plugins and is super intuitive.

WordPress For Ecommerce

With WooCommerce, WordPress becomes a powerful ecommerce hosting platform, with a wide range of ecommerce features comparable to Shopify.

Our custom WordPress ecommerce sites have advanced functionality and unparalleled control over website design, search engine optimization, database management, workflow automation, data security, and site speed performance.

Other WordPress Services

Here are some of our other custom WordPress services:

  • Digital strategy
  • Conversion rate optimization for WordPress
  • Page speed optimization for WordPress
  • WordPress SEO
  • WordPress website support
  • WordPress migration
  • WordPress site maintenance

Whether you need a new WordPress website or want to redesign an existing WordPress site, we can help.

 

WordPress Migration

If you want to migrate your site to WordPress from another platform such as Shopify, Webflow, or Magento, we can help.

Our WordPress migration services make sure that your site is transferred quickly and safely, guaranteeing an effortless transition between servers.

We will update your WordPress core and also ensure that any new changes are optimized for the best performance and have greater compatibility across all devices and browsers.

 

WordPress Website Support

Our website support team is dedicated to providing the highest level of customer service. We understand that you rely on your website functioning smoothly 100% of the time, so we are here to make sure it does!

We work hard to make sure that our clients can always and continuously use their website’s data, resources, and applications. Our top priority is ensuring complete reliability and availability for all our customers.

From resolving technical issues to regularly updating the look and feel of your website, our website support services include:

  • Data and analytics

  • Website maintenance
  • Landing page design

WordPress Multilingual Services

A multilingual website can help you reach more customers. Our skilled team works with you to create a custom multilingual WordPress website that accurately reflects your brand, engages your target audience, and helps you achieve your business goals.

Our multilingual services allow you to speak to a global audience and attract more customers. Here are some of the multilingual methods we employ:

  1. Adding a visible language switcher
  2. Creating multi language website templates
  3. Adding appropriate images

 

WordPress Conversion Rate Optimization

Conversion rate is hugely important for your business, and we’ve made a science of conversion rate optimization. We can help you turn your WordPress website into a conversion machine.

Your conversion rate is the number of conversions divided by the number of visitors, multiplied by 100. If you get 100 visitors, and out of those you get 4 purchases, your conversion rate is 4%. The conversion rate is a key metric for businesses to track, as it indicates how well they are doing at turning web traffic into paying customers.

There are a number of factors that can influence conversion rate, such as the website’s design, the quality of your product, shipping, and your pricing. Conversion rates can be optimized by using A/B tests for different versions of the website and by providing users with an incentive to convert, such as a discount or free shipping.

Our team of experts knows how to make your Wordpress website get more visits and more conversions. We look at your site’s performance data to make a custom plan to help you get the most out of every site visit.

With our CRO services, you’ll see measurable improvements in your site’s performance, such as more conversions, more sales, and happier customers. And because we continue to monitor and improve your site, you can be sure that it will continue to perform.

 

WordPress Page Speed Optimization

Page speed optimization is an important factor for your Wordpress website as it impacts the user experience and has a big impact on conversions and sales. Slow-loading websites will lead to increased bounce rates, decreased customer engagement, and lower search engine rankings.

There are several ways to improve page speed for your website, including optimizing images, minifying code, and using a content delivery network (CDN)-and our designers and developers specialize in all of them.

Future Planning Your WordPress Website

Building a successful website involves much more than pretty design. To meet and exceed expectations, you need to incorporate amazing customer experiences, online marketing strategies, and technology trends. That’s why many companies and site owners turn to us when they need a WordPress web redesign.

Our wealth of experience in WordPress websites allows us to anticipate future trends and future-proof your site so it stays relevant longer.

At Jorban, we take pride in being a trusted WordPress agency partner for your business.

Our creative design and development experts are passionate about helping you create a website that is both attractive and efficient, so you can get the most out of your digital presence.

Whether you have questions about WordPress hosting, are looking to create an online store, or need your site to convert better, we’d love to chat with you.

WordPress Agency FAQ

What is a WordPress agency?

A WordPress agency is a company that specializes in using the WordPress platform to design, build, and manage websites.

A WordPress agency may offer a wide range of services, including website hosting, custom design and development, retail ecommerce solutions, content management systems, plugin integration, and analytics tracking.

WordPress agencies work with clients to make sure their unique business needs are met by providing customized services that are tailored to their goals and budget.

How do I choose a WordPress agency?

Research agencies to make sure they have the relevant expertise for your project. Look for completed projects in their portfolio that match your goals and objectives.

Look for good reviews from customers and approval from other groups. Determine the approach of the agency by gaining insights into how they take on new projects, keeping in mind their size, availability, and timeline estimates.

Lastly, before giving the go-ahead on any project, understand what role will be played by your business in bringing the project to a successful conclusion.

Do web agencies use WordPress?

Many web agencies use WordPress. For example, the Jorbanwebsite is built on WordPress.

What is a WordPress development agency?

A WordPress development agency is a creative agency that specializes in developing WordPress websites.

Leading WordPress agencies build customized websites tailored to their clients’ needs.

Typically, WordPress agencies for web development offer services such as setting up hosting accounts, handling domain names, creating custom themes, coding plugins, developing custom code, and ensuring website optimization.

Apart from their expertise with the content management system itself, WordPress development agencies may also help clients with search engine optimization and content marketing strategies. These all-inclusive services make sure that a client’s website stands out from the rest and works well for people who visit it.

Four of the most reliable and renowned WordPress development agencies include Wholegrain Digital, SquareBird Digital, Sheer Digital Agency, and North Street Creative. And, of course, Jorban. All of these WordPress specialists have impressive portfolios and boast industry leading credentials.

  • As a WordPress development company, Wholegrain Digital provides comprehensive global-scale ecommerce store implementation.
  • SquareBird is the perfect partner for any type of WordPress development project involving enterprise-level marketplaces.
  • The Sheer Digital marketing agency can help maximize your marketing efforts with top-of-the-line search engine optimization services.
  • North Street Creative-as a WordPress VIP silver agency partner-has access to powerful development tools for complex integrations.
  • Jorbanhas a vast portfolio of successful WordPress projects across many industries, and our client reviews speak for themselves.

What is managed WordPress hosting?

Managed WordPress hosting is a type of web hosting for websites on WordPress. It involves additional support beyond the hosting itself.

A managed WordPress host provides advantages such as automatic staging and backups, secure settings, updated software, and managed security.

Where do I find WordPress experts?

If you’re looking for WordPress experts, there are a number of platforms you can use to find a qualified professional.

Codeable is a great option for custom software projects, as it only works with veteran developers that have proven results.

Toptal’s network also comprises experienced developers and designers for web projects, but with a more global reach than Codeable.

For shorter-term contracts and maintenance projects, services such as Envato Studio and WordPress Jobs can help narrow down the list of applicants quickly.

Other sites like WPHired or GitHub Jobs filter through their lists using skill criteria to let employers look at only the most capable candidates.

The WordPress community is rife with freelancers and companies offering their website expertise on smaller job boards such as Smashing Jobs or through freelance marketplaces such as Freelancer.com and Upwork.

Or, you can hire Jorbanfor your WordPress needs. We are a leading WordPress agency, and our WordPress experts are second to none.

Do I need a website designer for WordPress?

While WordPress is among the most popular platforms for building websites, designing a website requires more than just working with a template.

For example, you would need to know how to take advantage of back-end features such as optimizing content for search engine visibility and creating multi-functional navigation.

Hiring a professional website designer (or even a front-end developer) can help you make sure that your site looks the way you want it to. When it comes to WordPress redesign, the web designer provides WordPress expertise that helps reduce the amount of time required to make changes.

Some brands opt to hire a WordPress freelancer instead of a full-service WordPress agency. While this can be an affordable option, a freelancer often can’t provide the same level of website service as an agency.

Can we use JavaScript with WordPress?

If you want to add dynamic content to your WordPress site, you can do so by using JavaScript libraries. This will let you add things like animated content, forms, and other things that people can interact with. You can also use JavaScript to create custom front-end solutions for your WordPress site.

What is a WordPress retainer?

A WordPress retainer is a maintenance contract in which a WordPress agency provides ongoing WordPress website maintenance and support. A full service WordPress agency may also provide custom development, UX/UI design, and website updates as needed. From weekly check-ins to code reviews and bug fixes, the contract ensures your website remains optimized, secure, and up-to-date with all the latest online trends. WordPress development retainers help to keep WordPress sites healthy and running smoothly.

Is WP Engine the same as WordPress?

WP Engine is a web hosting solution that is specifically tailored to the WordPress platform. It is also a crowd favorite WordPress hosting solution and provides tailored services specifically for the WordPress platform. These include API integration, automated updates and improved loading speeds.

The web server software itself is the same between WP Engine and WordPress; however, WP Engine supplies a suite of tools optimized for WordPress sites. This includes using the latest versions of PHP and MySQL, which further increase performance and security. Whether you’re looking to build a website from scratch or simply want more control over an existing project, WP Engine can provide a tailor-fit solution that is backed by 24/7 customer support.

There are also many other great cloud hosting solutions for WordPress sites.

What are the most useful plugins for WordPress?

WordPress is an incredibly useful platform for website creation and management, but it is made even more powerful by the utilization of plugins.

  • One of the most popular and beneficial plugins for WordPress is the website builder Elementor, which helps with page building and design customization.
  • Yoast SEO helps webmasters increase their website’s visibility in search engines and optimize content for greater audience reach.
  • Akismet is also a valuable plugin, protecting websites from malicious comments left by spammers.
  • For collecting leads and emails, there’s Gravity Forms. It provides a user-friendly interface for collecting data from customers.
  • For WordPress booking, specialized plugins like TeamBooking, WooCommerce Bookings, or BirchPress Scheduler are helpful for creating appointment booking pages on any WordPress site.
  • WP Rocket can speed up loading times and lower server costs to improve the performance of a website.
  • Imagify is also a great plugin for compressing images to make pages load faster without sacrificing quality.

There are also booking plugins, plugins to manage your events calendar, plugins to auto-stream your social media feed onto your site, and many other types.

Is there a headless WordPress solution?

A headless WordPress site decouples the frontend user experience from content management. It uses WordPress as a content management system (CMS) only; the visual presentation of the content is done via some other system.

Is WordPress good for client management?

If you’re looking to manage client interactions, you might want to invest in customer relationship management (CRM) software like HubSpot or Zoho CRM.

Can I build an online store on WordPress?

Yes, with WooCommerce, you can manage your ecommerce business on WordPress. WooCommerce is a powerful ecommerce solution that sits atop the WordPress platform and adds shopping cart functionality and other essential ecommerce capabilities.

What does WordPress Multisite do?

WordPress Multisite is a powerful WordPress feature that allows users to create and manage multiple WordPress sites from a single WordPress installation. It provides a shared user base, which enables user authentication across multiple WordPress sites. It also allows site administrators to manage installations from one WordPress dashboard and customize the network of websites with common settings, themes, plugins, and more.

WordPress Multisite is particularly useful for WordPress users looking for an easier way to create and manage multiple WordPress sites and networks of websites, for either business or personal use.

There are also booking plugins, scheduling plugins, and all sorts of other handy WordPress plugins.

Do you offer digital marketing services?

We are not a full-service digital agency, but we do offer a limited range of online marketing, social media, and content marketing services, including:

  • Paid advertising (Google, Facebook, Instagram)
  • Search engine optimization

As a WordPress design and development agency, we’re also totally comfortable collaborating with your existing teams to develop a digital strategy that complements your existing efforts and helps you meet your specific targets and achieve your business goals.

For more comprehensive help with marketing automation, performance marketing, social media marketing, app development, ecommerce marketing strategies, or plugin development, we can refer you to our partnership program of trusted marketing agency partners and WordPress core contributors who can help with your marketing campaigns.
